data.text:
@LAZARUSCHAKWERA Bread cost K1050.00 we village people are able to manage

VAT its mean problem
@LAZARUSCHAKWERA Mmmmmmmm Mr. President many Malawians are regretting for putting you in that Office

@LAZARUSCHAKWERA Meaning we can defeat the virus , though without research center, without vaccine plant, without protection disposable factories and not even certified sanitizer plant, where is this hope cone from? The virus has disappear it's self not some body's effort in Malawi. Thank you.
@LAZARUSCHAKWERA How about you please tell us about the reforms report that was submitted to you by the vice president....what's so hard or bad in that report that you can't tell us about?
@LAZARUSCHAKWERA How can we defeat something that has already been DEFEATED here in MW?

@LAZARUSCHAKWERA Mr. President most Malawians love you so much! But you alone is disappointing them! Just get heed of what those at a distance are telling you! Those around you will never tell you the truth! The SPC is really a stumbling block in your Administration!

@LAZARUSCHAKWERA Hope you have read the pastoral letter, it seems you are letting yourself and Malawians down big time. Your unwillingness to act on straightforward issues is irritating so many people who voted for you. DPP used to think will rule till 2095.
